original_text: Be careful then! Remember what God's prophets spoke about long ago. Do not let that happen to you. This is what one of them wrote:
korean_text: 그런즉 너희는 선지자들을 통하여 말씀하신 것이 너희에게 미칠까 삼가라

sentences.original_text: Remember what God's prophets spoke about long ago.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 선지자들이 오래전에 말한 것을 기억하라.

sentences.original_text: Do not let that happen to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 일이 너희에게 일어나지 않도록 하라.

sentences.original_text: This is what one of them wrote:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 이렇게 썼다:
